de.mrapp.android.util

Class DisplayUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.mrapp.android.util.DisplayUtil

  • public class DisplayUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    An utility class, which provides static methods, which are related to a device's display metrics.
    Since:
    1.0.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  DisplayUtil.DeviceType
      Contains all possible types of devices, depending on their display size.
      static class  DisplayUtil.Orientation
      Contains all possible orientations of devices.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static float PIXEL_DP_RATIO
      The ratio, which can be used to convert values, which are measured in pixels, into values, which are measured in dp, and vice versa.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static double dpToPixels(android.content.Context context, double dp)
      Converts a Double value, which is measured in dp, into a value, which is measured in pixels.

      Converts a Float value, which is measured in dp, into a value, which is measured in pixels.

      Converts an Integer value, which is measured in dp, into a value, which is measured in pixels.

      Converts an Integer value, which is measured in dp, into a value, which is measured in pixels.

      Returns the width of the device's display.

    • Method Detail

      • pixelsToDp

        public static int pixelsToDp(android.content.Context context,
                             int pixels)
        Converts an Integer value, which is measured in pixels, into a value, which is measured in dp.
        Parameters:
        context - The context, which should be used, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
        pixels - The pixel value, which should be converted, as an Integer value
        Returns:
        The calculated dp value as an Integer value. The value might be rounded

      • pixelsToDp

                              long pixels)
        Converts an Long value, which is measured in pixels, into a value, which is measured in dp.
        Parameters:
        context - The context, which should be used, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
        pixels - The pixel value, which should be converted, as an Long value
        Returns:
        The calculated dp value as an Long value. The value might be rounded

      • getOrientation

        public static DisplayUtil.Orientation getOrientation(android.content.Context context)
        Returns the orientation of the device.
        Parameters:
        context - The context, which should be used, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
        Returns:
        The orientation of the device as a value of the enum DisplayUtil.Orientation. The orientation may either be PORTRAIT, LANDSCAPE or SQUARE

      • getDeviceType

        public static DisplayUtil.DeviceType getDeviceType(android.content.Context context)
        Returns the type of the device, depending on its display size.
        Parameters:
        context - The context, which should be used, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
        Returns:
        The type of the device as a value of the enum DisplayUtil.DeviceType. The type may either be PHONE, PHABLET or TABLET

      • getDisplayWidth

        public static int getDisplayWidth(android.content.Context context)
        Returns the width of the device's display.
        Parameters:
        context - The context, which should be used, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
        Returns:
        The width of the device's display in pixels as an Integer value

      • getDisplayHeight

        public static int getDisplayHeight(android.content.Context context)
        Returns the height of the device's display.
        Parameters:
        context - The context, which should be used, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
        Returns:
        The height of the device's display in pixels as an Integer value

      • getStatusBarHeight

        public static int getStatusBarHeight(android.content.Context context)
        Returns the height of the status bar, which is shown at the top of the display (containing the clock, battery indicator, etc.).
        Parameters:
        context - The context, which should be used, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
        Returns:
        The height of the status bar in pixels as an Integer value

      • getNavigationBarHeight

        public static int getNavigationBarHeight(android.content.Context context)
        Returns the height of the navigation bar, which is shown at the bottom of the display (containing for example back, home and recent apps soft-keys).
        Parameters:
        context - The context, which should be used, as an instance of the class Context. The context may not be null
        Returns:
        The height of the navigation bar in pixels as an Integer value or 0, if no navigation bar is shown
